text:
Belge No (5) - Licence No
İlk Belge Veriliş Tarihi - Date of First Issue
Belge Veriliş Tarihi (4a) - Date of Issue
Geçerlilik Tarihi (4b) - Date of Expiry
Sınıar (9) - Classes
Kısıtlamalar (12) - Restricon Codes
AÇIKLAMALAR / DESCRIPTIONS
ŞEHİTKAMİL 89114 31/10/2024 31/10/2024 31/10/2034 B,B1,F,M
Sürücü Belge Kısıtları: 01.06
1. Bu geçici sürücü belgesi 30/11/2024 tarihine kadar geçerlidir.
This provisional driving licence is valid unl 30/11/2024
2. Sürücü belgesinin teslim alınmasından sonra geçici sürücü belgesinin geçerliliği sona erer.
The validity of this provisional driving licence ends aer receiving the driving licence.
3. E-Devlet üzerinden alınan bu geçici sürücü belgesi, 5490 Sayılı Nüfus Hizmetleri Kanununun 44. maddesinin 5. krası kapsamında Nüfus Müdürlüğü tarandan verilen “Geçici Sürücü Belgesi” ile aynı hukuki değere sahipr.
In accordance with Arcle 44§5 of the ”Civil Registry Services Law” No. 5490, this provisional driving licence which was issued via the e-Government system, has the same legal value as the ”Provisional Driving Licence” issued by the Civil Registry Oce.
trans:
Document No (5) - License No
First Issue Date - Date of First Issue
Issue Date (4a) - Date of Issue
Expiry Date (4b) - Date of Expiry
Classes (9) - Classes
Restrictions (12) - Restriction Codes
DESCRIPTIONS / DESCRIPTIONS
ŞEHITKAMIL 89114 31/10/2024 31/10/2024 31/10/2034 B, B1, F, M
Driver's License Restrictions: 01.06
1.This provisional driving license is valid until 30/11/2024.
This provisional driving license is valid until 30/11/2024.
2.The validity of this provisional driving license ends after receiving the driving license.
The validity of this provisional driving license ends after receiving the driving license.
3.This provisional driving license, obtained through e-Government, holds the same legal value as the "Provisional Driving License" issued by the Population Directorate in accordance with Article 44(§5) of the "Civil Registry Services Law" No. 5490.
This provisional driving license, obtained through e-Government, holds the same legal value as the "Provisional Driving License" issued by the Population Directorate in accordance with Article 44(§5) of the "Civil Registry Services Law" No. 5490.
